tool_description: The world's first unified web3 API. We aim to make blockchain integrations easier to do and for less!
name: Uniblock
title: Uniblock

api_list.name: Get Historical Token Balance
api_list.description: Gets the user's historical portfolio value and balance records along with token info.

required_parameters.name: walletAddress
required_parameters.description: The address that the balance records are tied to. Accepts either address or ENS

required_parameters.name: timestamp
required_parameters.description: Numerical representation of the earliest date the balance records were indexed. Unix timestamp in seconds.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network to filter through balance records.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of records to skip in the query.

optional_parameters.name: sortBy
optional_parameters.description: Specify how to sort assets. E.g. 'balance', 'value'...

optional_parameters.name: sortByDate
optional_parameters.description: Specify whether to sort records chronologically or reverse-chronologically (asc/desc).

optional_parameters.name: tokenAddress
optional_parameters.description: The address of a specific token to filter through the balance records.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of balance records to return.

optional_parameters.name: sortDirection
optional_parameters.description: Specify whether to sort records in ascending or descending order (asc/desc).

api_list.name: Format Units
api_list.description: Gets a string representation of a given value formatted with unit digits.

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: Value to format in string.

required_parameters.name: unit
required_parameters.description: Number of decimals (“18”, ...) or named units (“wei”, “ether”, ...).

api_list.name: Convert Units
api_list.description: Gets the converted value (decimal units to number or number to decimal units) of a specified amount of a token.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network that the token resides on.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Token contract address that will be used to determine the number of digits to convert the value.

required_parameters.name: direction
required_parameters.description:
Specifies conversion method.
    
 * From: Converts a number in units to an actual number.
    
 * To: Converts the actual number to a number in units.

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: Value to format.

api_list.name: Parse Ether
api_list.description: Gets a string representation of a given value, parsed with 18 digits (in terms of wei).

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: Value to parse.

api_list.name: Create Wallet from Mnemonic
api_list.description: Generates a wallet from a mnemonic phrase and index. If no index is provided, it will default to 0.

required_parameters.name: mnemonic
required_parameters.description: Mnemonic phrase to generate a wallet from.

optional_parameters.name: index
optional_parameters.description: Generate a wallet from the index and the mnemonic phrase pair.

api_list.name: Generate Mnemonic
api_list.description: Generates a random mnemonic, defaults to 128-bits of entropy
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uniblock1.p.rapidapi.com/wallet/generateMnemonic"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uniblock1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://uniblock1.p.rapidapi.com/wallet/generateMnemonic"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uniblock1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Current Block Number
api_list.description: Gets the current block number.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network to fetch the current block number from.

api_list.name: Look up Address
api_list.description: Looks up the ens domain for a crypto address if there is any domain bound with the address.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Address of the user to fetch the default ENS domain for.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network to fetch the default ENS domain for.

api_list.name: Get Token Balance
api_list.description: Gets the balance of an ERC-20 token.

required_parameters.name: contractAddress
required_parameters.description: Contract address of ERC-20 token.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network that the contract address resides on.

required_parameters.name: walletAddress
required_parameters.description: The wallet address of the ERC-20 token's owner.

api_list.name: Get Decimals
api_list.description: Gets the number of decimal places used by an ERC-20 token.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network that the contract address resides on.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Contract address of ERC-20 token.

api_list.name: Get Native Balance at Block
api_list.description: Gets the native token balance of an address at a given block.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: The wallet address of the user whose balance is being retrieved.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Specific network to fetch the user balance for.

required_parameters.name: blockNumber
required_parameters.description: Block number to retrieve user balance.

api_list.name: Get Approval For NFT Transfer
api_list.description: Determines whether or not a spender address can transfer the NFTs of an owner address.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: ERC-721/ERC-1155 contract address that will be used to determine whether or not the spender can transfer tokens from the owner.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network that the token resides on.

required_parameters.name: spender
required_parameters.description: The spender of the allowed tokens.

required_parameters.name: owner
required_parameters.description: The address which we want to determine the approval of all NFTs of.

api_list.name: Get Event Logs
api_list.description: Gets the logs of a contract.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: The address to fetch logs from.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network to fetch logs for.

optional_parameters.name: startBlock
optional_parameters.description: The block to start fetching logs for.

optional_parameters.name: endBlock
optional_parameters.description: The block to stop fetching logs for.

api_list.name: Get Event Logs within Block range
api_list.description: Gets the event logs in a block range, filtered by topics.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network to fetch logs for.

required_parameters.name: topics
required_parameters.description: The topic to fetch logs for.

optional_parameters.name: endBlock
optional_parameters.description: The block to stop fetching logs for.

optional_parameters.name: startBlock
optional_parameters.description: The block to start fetching logs for.

api_list.name: Get Collection NFTs
api_list.description: Gets all NFTs in a collection

required_parameters.name: nftAddress
required_parameters.description: Enter the address of the NFT collection

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Enter the chain ID of the specific NFT to query

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of records to skip in the query.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of NFT balance records to return.

api_list.name: Get Token Price History between Dates
api_list.description: Gets the price chart of a token between two dates in USD.

required_parameters.name: endDate
required_parameters.description: Returns the chart ending at this timestamp. Unix timestamp in seconds.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Specific network the desired coin resides on.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: The token address of the desired coin.

required_parameters.name: startDate
required_parameters.description: Returns the chart starting at this timestamp. Unix timestamp in seconds.

api_list.name: Get Transaction By Hash
api_list.description: Gets transaction information of a given hash

required_parameters.name: hash
required_parameters.description: Transaction hash to get transaction information from.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network to retrieve transaction information from.

api_list.name: Get Transactions For User
api_list.description: Gets transaction records for a specified user.

required_parameters.name: walletAddress
required_parameters.description: The user address that the transaction records are tied to. Accepts either address or ENS.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network to filter through transaction records.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of records to skip in the query.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: The cursor returned in the previous response (used to getting the next page).

optional_parameters.name: sortByDate
optional_parameters.description: Specify whether to sort records chronologically or reverse-chronologically (asc/desc).

optional_parameters.name: tokenType
optional_parameters.description: Specify token type to filter through transaction records.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of balance records to return.

optional_parameters.name: direction
optional_parameters.description: Filter transactions based on whether they were sent or received.

optional_parameters.name: startTimestamp
optional_parameters.description: Returns transactions starting from this date. Unix timestamp in seconds.

optional_parameters.name: interactingWith
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the wallet or contract address of the second-party involved in the transaction.

optional_parameters.name: endTimestamp
optional_parameters.description: Returns transactions before this date. Unix timestamp in seconds.

api_list.name: Ping Server
api_list.description: Check API server status.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uniblock1.p.rapidapi.com/ping"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uniblock1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Current Price
api_list.description: Gets the current price of a token in USD.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Specific network the desired coin resides on.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: The token address of the desired coin.

api_list.name: Get Token Price History by Period
api_list.description: Gets the price chart of a token within a given period in USD.

required_parameters.name: period
required_parameters.description: Returns the chart within this time.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: The token address of the desired coin.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Specific network the desired coin resides on.

api_list.name: Create Wallet
api_list.description: Creates and gets a new wallet with a random private key, generated from cryptographically secure entropy sources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://uniblock1.p.rapidapi.com/wallet/createWallet"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "uniblock1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Token Price History between Blocks

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: The token address of the desired coin.

required_parameters.name: startBlock
required_parameters.description: The start block that was requested.

required_parameters.name: endBlock
required_parameters.description: Returns the users net worth chart ending at this block.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Specific network the desired coin resides on.

required_parameters.description: Network to fetch information about a specific block.

required_parameters.name: blockNumber
required_parameters.description: Block number to retrieve timestamp.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network to fetch a timestamp from.

api_list.description: Gets the block number closest to the given timestamp.

required_parameters.description: Network to fetch a timestamp from.

required_parameters.name: timestamp
required_parameters.description: Date to retrieve block. Unix timestamp in seconds.

api_list.description: Gets the block of a given block number

required_parameters.name: blockNumber
required_parameters.description: Block number to retrieve timestamp.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network to fetch the block from.

required_parameters.description: ENS domain to resolve.

api_list.name: Get Native Balance
api_list.description: Gets the native token balance of an address.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Specific network to fetch the user balance for.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: The wallet address of the user whose balance is being retrieved.

api_list.name: Get Symbol
api_list.description: Gets the symbol of a given ERC-20 token

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network that the contract address resides on.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Contract address of ERC-20 token.

api_list.name: Format Ether
api_list.description: Gets a string representation of a given value in terms of ether.

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: Value to format.

api_list.name: Parse Units
api_list.description: Gets a string representation of value, parsed with unit digits.

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: Value to parse.

required_parameters.name: unit
required_parameters.description: Number of decimals (“18”, ...) or named units (“wei”, “ether”, ...).

api_list.name: Get Code
api_list.description: Gets the code at a given address and network (chainId). This code can be used to distinguish between contract addresses and wallet addresses. Contract addresses return bytecode whereas wallet addresses return "0x".

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: Wallet or contract address to retrieve code from.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network that the given address resides on.

api_list.name: Commify
api_list.description: Gets a string grouped by three digits separated by comma(s).

required_parameters.name: value
required_parameters.description: Numerical value to format.

api_list.name: Get Gas Price
api_list.description: Gets the best estimate for gas price to use in a transaction.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network to retrieve gas price estimate for.

api_list.name: Get Event Logs filtered by Topic
api_list.description: Gets the event logs by address filtered by topics.

required_parameters.name: topics
required_parameters.description: The topic to fetch logs for.

required_parameters.name: address
required_parameters.description: The address to fetch logs from.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network to fetch logs for.

optional_parameters.name: startBlock
optional_parameters.description: The block to start fetching logs for.

optional_parameters.name: endBlock
optional_parameters.description: The block to stop fetching logs for.

api_list.name: Get NFT Owner

required_parameters.description: Enter the NFT ID of the specific NFT to query.

required_parameters.name: nftAddress
required_parameters.description: Enter the address of the NFT contract.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Enter the chain ID of the specific NFT to query.

api_list.name: Get Current NFT Balance for User
api_list.description: Gets the NFT balance of a specific user.

required_parameters.name: walletAddress
required_parameters.description: The wallet address of the user whose NFT balances are being retrieved. Accepts either address or ENS.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Specific network to fetch the user's NFT balance.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of records to skip in the query.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of NFT balance records to return.

optional_parameters.name: nftAddress
optional_parameters.description: The address of a specific NFT contract.

optional_parameters.name: nftId
optional_parameters.description: Id of the specific NFT to query.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: The cursor returned in the previous response (used to getting the next page).

api_list.name: Get NFT Collection Metadata
api_list.description: Fetches NFT collection metadata.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Specific network to fetch the user's NFT balance.

required_parameters.name: collectionAddress
required_parameters.description: The address of a specific NFT contract.

api_list.name: Get Historical NFT Balances
api_list.description: Gets the user's historical NFT balance records.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Specific network to fetch the user's NFT balance.

required_parameters.name: walletAddress
required_parameters.description: The wallet address of the user whose NFT balances are being retrieved. Accepts either address or ENS.

required_parameters.name: timestamp
required_parameters.description: Date to retrieve user's NFT balances. Unix timestamp in seconds.

optional_parameters.name: nftId
optional_parameters.description: Id of the specific NFT to query.

optional_parameters.name: nftAddress
optional_parameters.description: The address of a particular NFT contract.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of rows to skip in query.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of NFT balance records to return.

api_list.name: Get Nft Info
api_list.description: Gets information of a specific NFT.

required_parameters.name: nftId
required_parameters.description: Enter the NFT ID of the specific NFT to query.

required_parameters.name: nftAddress
required_parameters.description: Enter the address of the NFT contract.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Enter the chain ID of the specific NFT to query.

api_list.name: Get NFT Transfers For User
api_list.description: Gets NFT transfer records for a specified user.

required_parameters.name: walletAddress
required_parameters.description: The user address that the transaction records are tied to. Accepts either address or ENS.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network to filter through NFT transfer records.

optional_parameters.name: interactingWith
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the wallet or contract address of the second-party involved in the NFT transfer.

optional_parameters.name: nftId
optional_parameters.description: Specify NFT ID to filter for in the NFT transfer records.

optional_parameters.name: nftAddress
optional_parameters.description: Specify NFT address to filter for in the NFT transfer records.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: The cursor returned in the previous response (used to getting the next page).

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of records to skip in the query.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of NFT transfer records to return.

optional_parameters.name: sortByDate
optional_parameters.description: Specify whether to sort NFT transfers chronologically or reverse-chronologically (asc/desc).

optional_parameters.name: direction
optional_parameters.description: Filter transactions based on whether they were sent or received.

api_list.name: Get User Collections
api_list.description: Gets all NFT collections of a specific user.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Enter the chain ID of the specific NFT to query.

required_parameters.name: walletAddress
required_parameters.description: The wallet address of the user whose NFT balances are being retrieved. Accepts either address or ENS.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of NFT balance records to return.

optional_parameters.name: nftAddress
optional_parameters.description: Enter the address of the NFT collection.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of records to skip in the query.

api_list.name: Get Token Transfers For User
api_list.description: Gets token transfer records for a specified user.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network to filter through token transfer records.

required_parameters.name: walletAddress
required_parameters.description: The user address that the transaction records are tied to. Accepts either address or ENS.

optional_parameters.name: direction
optional_parameters.description: Filter transactions based on whether they were sent or received.

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: The cursor returned in the previous response (used to getting the next page).

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of token transfer records to return.

optional_parameters.name: tokenAddress
optional_parameters.description: Specify token address to filter for in the token transfer records.

optional_parameters.name: sortByDate
optional_parameters.description: Specify whether to sort token transfers chronologically or reverse-chronologically (asc/desc).

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of records to skip in the query.

optional_parameters.name: interactingWith
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the wallet or contract address of the second-party involved in the token transfer.

api_list.name: Get NFT Transfers For NFT Collection
api_list.description: Gets NFT transfer records for a specified NFT collection inclusive of token ID and addresses involved.

required_parameters.name: chainId
required_parameters.description: Network to filter through NFT transfer records.

required_parameters.name: nftAddress
required_parameters.description: The contract address that the transaction records are tied to.

optional_parameters.name: nftId
optional_parameters.description: Specify NFT ID to filter for in the NFT transfer records.

optional_parameters.name: sortByDate
optional_parameters.description: Specify whether to sort NFT transfers chronologically or reverse-chronologically (asc/desc).

optional_parameters.name: cursor
optional_parameters.description: The cursor returned in the previous response (used to getting the next page).

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Number of records to skip in the query.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of NFT transfer records to return.
